title: Why does Gangplank passive do true damage?
body: Because GLOWING 1000 DEGREE KNIFE cuts through anything.

replies.body:
What happens if you add GP passive to Chosen Yi?

http://img.memecdn.com/execute-order-1000dg_c_7061683.jpg
Oh come on this is gold its amazing its sooo perfect.
This has to be the best meme of 2017 on the boards. Nothing can beat that blond kid's face
{{champion:63}} Doesn't even deal True Damage despite being literally a "fire".
That's because he doesn't have a GLOWING 1000 DEGREE KNIFE. He's just fire and no knife.
yeah rip brand it's not true, it's a fake and sad rip off of the GLOWING 1000 DEGREE KNIFE

Initially, I believed this thread to be a genuine questioning as to the purpose of the champion Gangplank's passive ability inflicting damage refered to as "True", to which I would reply; "Because he doesn't ignore your armor enough already", but upon noticing the inherent meme-age of the thread in question, my response has been altered to become:

"Lel"
Please, someone photoshop GP's blade into the 1000 degree knife.
So how much longer till this meme dies?
I give it like a week or two
